titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives regarding United States efforts to promote peace and stability in the Gulf region between and among United States allies.
Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives regarding United States efforts to promote peace and stability in the Gulf region between and among United States allies.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Middle East, North Africa and International Terrorism.

committee.subcommittee: Middle East, North Africa and International Terrorism
committee.name: House Foreign Affairs

term.name: Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

bill.summary: This resolution expresses support for the Gulf Cooperative Council and its member states and encourages the President, as well as the Department of State, to employ all possible efforts to promote stability in the Gulf region.
